title: Highest Net Primary Income
description: In 2023, Japan had the highest net primary income in the world, amounting to $257.89 billion.

title: Largest Population in a City
description: Tokyo, Japan's largest city, had a population of 37,115,035 in 2024, making it the most populous city in the world.

title: Lowest Lending Interest Rate
description: In 2017, Japan had the lowest lending interest rate globally at 0.994%.

title: Highest Central Government Debt (% of GDP)
description: Japan had the highest central government debt as a percentage of GDP in 2022, reaching 216.21%.

title: Lowest Real Effective Exchange Rate Index
description: In 2023, Japan had the lowest real effective exchange rate index, with a value of 58.11.
